item.title: Project 3: End-to-end Classification Model Project Solving Attrition Problem
item.description: The main objective is to solve this bank-related problem where a business manager of a consumer credit card portfolio is facing a severe customer attrition problem in the recent months. The business manager wants to leverage the power of data analytics to understand the primary reasons of attrition. She also wants to have an ability to understand the customers who are likely to close their accounts with the bank in the near future, so that she can focus her team’s efforts, well in advance to retain those customers.

item.title: Project 2: Deploy ML Model using Flask and Pickle
item.description: Considering that most Machine Learning models built don’t reach the deployment phase, I created this simple project to try deploying an ML Model using Flask and Pickle. This, perhaps, is a very simple project but I like how I was able to deploy a model which can be of use thru an html page using an API. Yay! See the Full Project in Github Repository

item.title: Project 1: Semi-automated Clustering Function
item.description: Basically, I created a python function that (1.) makes use of the approriate clustering algorithm based on the data types of the input dataframe, and (2.) outputs the optimal count of cluster, assigned cluster for each observation, and centroids of each cluster. K-Means, K-Mode, and K- Prototype clustering algorithms and Elbow method are used in this project. See the Full Project in Github Repository
